title: Saturday lecture: Medieval disease and medicine
itunes:title: Saturday lecture: Medieval disease and medicine
itunes:subtitle: Elma Brenner explores some of the diseases that afflicted people in the Middle Ages, and the steps they took to heal the sick and avoid becoming ill in the first place. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
In the third of five talks from our virtual Medieval Life and Death Day event, historian Elma Brenner explores some of the diseases that afflicted people in the Middle Ages, and the steps they took to heal the sick and avoid becoming ill in the first place. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
